verses.verse: Likewise this is the Torah <WH8451> of the trespass offering <WH817>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.

In the place <WH4725> where they kill <WH7819> <WH8799> the burnt offering <WH5930> shall they kill <WH7819> <WH8799> the trespass offering <WH817>: and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall he sprinkle <WH2236> <WH8799> round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196>.
And he shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> of it all the fat <WH2459> thereof; the rump <WH451>, and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH8764> the inwards <WH7130>,

And the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is on them, which is by the flanks <WH3689>, and the caul <WH3508> that is above the liver <WH3516>, with the kidneys <WH3629>, it shall he take away <WH5493> <WH8686>:
And the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> them upon the altar <WH4196> for an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>: it is a trespass offering <WH817>.
Havahry male <WH2145> among the Kohanim <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof: it shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>: it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>.
As the sin offering <WH2403> is, so is the trespass offering <WH817>: there is one <WH259> Torah <WH8451> for them: the Kohen <WH3548> that maketh atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> therewith shall have it.

And the Kohen <WH3548> that offereth <WH7126> <WH8688> any man's <WH376> burnt offering <WH5930>, even the Kohen <WH3548> shall have to himself the skin <WH5785> of the burnt offering <WH5930> which he hath offered <WH7126> <WH8689>.

And all the meat offering <WH4503> that is baken <WH644> <WH8735> in the oven <WH8574>, and all that is dressed <WH6213> <WH8738> in the fryingpan <WH4802>, and in the pan <WH4227>, shall be the Kohen's <WH3548> that offereth <WH7126> <WH8688> it.
And every meat offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, and dry <WH2720>, shall all the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> have, one <WH376> as much as another <WH251>.
And this is the Torah <WH8451> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>, which he shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> unto the YY <WH3068>.

If he offer <WH7126> <WH8686> it for a thanksgiving <WH8426>, then he shall offer <WH7126> <WH8689> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, and unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, and cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, of fine flour <WH5560>, fried <WH7246> <WH8716>.

Besides the cakes <WH2471>, he shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> for his offering <WH7133> leavened <WH2557> bread <WH3899> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> of his peace offerings <WH8002>.

And of it he shall offer <WH7126> <WH8689> one <WH259> out of the whole oblation <WH7133> for an heave offering <WH8641> unto the YY <WH3068>, and it shall be the Kohen's <WH3548> that sprinkleth <WH2236> <WH8802> the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings <WH8002>.

And the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> for thanksgiving <WH8426> shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> the same day <WH3117> that it is offered <WH7133>; he shall not leave <WH3240> <WH8686> any of it until the morning <WH1242>.

But if the sacrifice <WH2077> of his offering <WH7133> be a vow <WH5088>, or a voluntary offering <WH5071>, it shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> the same day <WH3117> that he offereth <WH7126> <WH8687> his sacrifice <WH2077>: and on the morrow <WH4283> also the remainder <WH3498> <WH8737> of it shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>:
But the remainder <WH3498> <WH8737> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> shall be burnt <WH8313> <WH8735> with fire <WH784>.

And if any of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> at all <WH398> <WH8736> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it shall not be accepted <WH7521> <WH8735>, neither shall it be imputed <WH2803> <WH8735> unto him that offereth <WH7126> <WH8688> it: it shall be an abomination <WH6292>, and the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> <WH8802> of it shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> his iniquity <WH5771>.

And the flesh <WH1320> that toucheth <WH5060> <WH8799> any unclean <WH2931> thing shall not be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>; it shall be burnt <WH8313> <WH8735> with fire <WH784>: and as for the flesh <WH1320>, all that be clean <WH2889> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof.

But the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> <WH8799> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>, that pertain unto the YY <WH3068>, having his uncleanness <WH2932> upon him, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>.

Moreover the soul <WH5315> that shall touch <WH5060> <WH8799> any unclean <WH2932> thing, as the uncleanness <WH2932> of man <WH120>, or any unclean <WH2931> beast <WH929>, or any abominable <WH8263> unclean <WH2931> thing, and eat <WH398> <WH8804> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>, which pertain unto the YY <WH3068>, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> no manner of fat <WH2459>, of ox <WH7794>, or of sheep <WH3775>, or of goat <WH5795>.

And the fat <WH2459> of the beast that dieth of itself <WH5038>, and the fat <WH2459> of that which is torn with beasts <WH2966>, may be used <WH6213> <WH8735> in any other use <WH4399>: but ye shall in no wise <WH398> <WH8800> eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it.

For whosoever eateth <WH398> <WH8802> the fat <WH2459> of the beast <WH929>, of which men offer <WH7126> <WH8686> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>, even the soul <WH5315> that eateth <WH398> <WH8802> it shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>.
Moreover ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> no manner of blood <WH1818>, whether it be of fowl <WH5775> or of beast <WH929>, in any of your dwellings <WH4186>.
Whatsoever soul <WH5315> it be that eateth <WH398> <WH8799> any manner <WH3605> of blood <WH1818>, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from his people <WH5971>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, He that offereth <WH7126> <WH8688> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> unto the YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> his oblation <WH7133> unto the YY <WH3068> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002>.

His own hands <WH3027> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, the fat <WH2459> with the breast <WH2373>, it shall he bring <WH935> <WH8686>, that the breast <WH2373> may be waved <WH5130> <WH8687> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.
And the Kohen <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH8689> the fat <WH2459> upon the altar <WH4196>: but the breast <WH2373> shall be Aharon's <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> '.
And the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> shall ye give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the Kohen <WH3548> for an heave offering <WH8641> of the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace offerings <WH8002>.

He among the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>, that offereth <WH7126> <WH8688> the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings <WH8002>, and the fat <WH2459>, shall have the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> for his part <WH4490>.

For the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and the heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> have I taken <WH3947> <WH8804> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from off the sacrifices <WH2077> of their peace offerings <WH8002>, and have given <WH5414> <WH8799> them unto Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548> and unto his sons <WH1121> by a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> from among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

This is the portion of the anointing <WH4888> of Aharon <WH175>, and of the anointing <WH4888> of his sons <WH1121>, out of the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, in the day <WH3117> when he presented <WH7126> <WH8689> them to minister unto the YY <WH3068> in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>;

Which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> to be given <WH5414> <WH8800> them of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, in the day <WH3117> that he anointed <WH4886> <WH8800> them, by a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout their generations <WH1755>.

This is the Torah <WH8451> of the burnt offering <WH5930>, of the meat offering <WH4503>, and of the sin offering <WH2403>, and of the trespass offering <WH817>, and of the consecrations <WH4394>, and of the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace offerings <WH8002>;

Which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, in the day <WH3117> that he commanded <WH6680> <WH8763> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to offer <WH7126> <WH8687> their oblations <WH7133> unto the YY <WH3068>, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.
